scripts.limpiarCss: purgecss --css src/public/css/style.css --content src/public/templates/index.pug src/public/templates/components/*.pug src/public/js/*.js --output build/css/style.css --safelist offcanvas offcanvas-end offcanvas-header offcanvas-title btn-close offcanvas-body text-center w100 d-flex justify-content-evenly text-bg-dark p-2 rounded btn btn-primary bi bi-bag-heart-fill my-auto px-3 btn-light bg-danger bi-trash text-bg-danger
